serviceRegistryHeaders.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
serviceRegistryHeaders.description: Consumer ID, the same used to sign in WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE and registred in Service Registry

serviceRegistryHeaders.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
serviceRegistryHeaders.description: Token signed with the private key and generated with WM_CONSUMER.ID, WM_CONSUMER.INTIMESTAMP and WM_SEC.KEY_VERSION values

serviceRegistryHeaders.name: WM_CONSUMER.INTIMESTAMP
serviceRegistryHeaders.description: Current Timestamp, the same used to sign in WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE

serviceRegistryHeaders.name: WM_SEC.KEY_VERSION
serviceRegistryHeaders.description: Key version, the same used to sign in WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
